Deprecated List

Page DAZ Studio Plug-in Macros
Macro that adds a class type to the types that this plug-in exports. This should only be used for classes which were previously assigned a legacy Class ID. All new classes MUST have a GUID and should use the DZ_PLUGIN_CLASS_GUID() macro. See DAZ Studio Legacy Class IDs for more information. This function will continue to remain available indefinitely but should never be used in new source.

Member DzApp::getAppSettingsMgr () const
Use the DzAppSettings class now instead.

Class DzAppSettingsMgr

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::getBoolValue (const QString &key, bool def=false, bool *ok=NULL) const
Read a boolean value from the given key.

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::getColorValue (const QString &key, const QColor &def=Qtblack, bool *ok=NULL) const
Read a color value from the given key.

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::getFloatValue (const QString &key, float def=0.0f, bool *ok=NULL) const
Read a floating point value from the given key.

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::getIntValue (const QString &key, int def=0, bool *ok=NULL) const
Read a integer value from the given key.

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::getStringValue (const QString &key, const QString &def=QStringnull, bool *ok=NULL) const
Read a string value from the given key.

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::popPath ()
Pops a temporary key path off the top of the stack.

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::pushPath (const QString &path)
Sets the current key path temporarily to the given path. This must be matched with a call to popPath().

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::removeValue (const QString &key)
Removes a key by name

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::setBoolValue (const QString &key, bool setting)
Write key with a boolean value.

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::setColorValue (const QString &key, const QColor &setting)
Write key with a color value.

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::setFloatValue (const QString &key, double setting)
Write key with a floating point value.

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::setIntValue (const QString &key, int setting)
Write key with a integer value.

Member DzAppSettingsMgr::setStringValue (const QString &key, const QString &setting)
Write key with a string value.

Member DzBase::getName ()
Provided for DAZ Script backwards compatibility only. Script developers should use the property name instead, which is available for all QObjects, not just DAZ Studio objects.

Member DzBase::iskindof (const QString &clname)
Provided for DAZ Script backwards compatibility only. Script developers should use the function QOBject::inherits() instead, which is available for all QObjects, not just DAZ Studio objects.

Member DzBase::save (DzOutFile *file) const
.daz file format is deprecated, please use df/dsf format for saving. See the projects under the saving folder for examples.

Member DzContentMgr::doContentSearch ()
This function is provided to keep old source working. This function does nothing and always returns false.

Member DzContentMgr::setCheckCompatibilityOn (bool useCheckCompatibility)
This function is provided to keep old source working. This function does nothing.

Member DzContentMgr::usingCheckCompatibility ()
This function is provided to keep old source working. This function does nothing and always returns false.

Member DzERCLink::evaluate (DzTime time, bool local=false) const
This function is still available for the class, but it no longer returns the expected value.

Use sort() instead.

Use sort() instead.

Use sort() instead.

Member DzImageMgr::saveLayeredImage (const QString &filename, const DzLayeredImage *image, int exporterIdx=-1)
